seo: JBoss,漏洞检测,CVE-2017-7504,反序列化漏洞
summary: 该插件用于检测JBoss 4.x JBossMQ JMS是否存在CVE-2017-7504反序列化漏洞，通过发送特定payload并验证DNS回显来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is a CVE-2017-7504 deserialization vulnerability in JBoss 4.x JBossMQ JMS. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by sending a specific payload and verifying DNS callbacks.
